rules_text:
When Imperious Maiden enters the battlefield, conscript. [i](Create a 1/1 red and white Soldier creature token or tap two untapped creatures you control to put a +1/+1 counter on them.)[/i]
At the beginning of your end step, if you control three or more tapped creatures, Imperious Maiden deals 1 damage to each opponent and planeswalker they control.
